attributes.action: Save Tower Hamlets Cemetery in Bow
attributes.additional_details:
We at Moulana Ezzad Ali Funerals c/o T.Cribb & Sons have an alternative for the Muslims in Tower Hamlets!
We both Muslims and Non Muslims of the Community will come together as one and Fight to keep our Historical Site. A site in which our schools community and local wildlife still enjoy and use.
Not to mention the endangered species or bees and butterflies that exist there!
We are against Abdal Ullah's plans for the Muslim Cemetery and we are calling for them to work along side T.Cribb & Sons 1881 and Moulana Ezzad Ali Funerals to create an alternative in which both the Non Muslims and the Muslims can enjoy together with no conflict and no damage to out historic heritage.
HANDS OFF TOWER HAMLETS CEMETERY!
